PHRASE.LANG: kName
nFashion - Harajuku Female Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Lot de vêtements pour femme Harajuku
nFashion - Harajuku-Kleidungsstücke-Bundle (Frau)
nFashion - Pacchetto Abbigliamento Harajuku donna
nFashion: lote de ropa Harajuku para mujer
nFashion - ハラジュク女性用衣装セット
nFashion - Harajuku Female Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Harajuku Female Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Harajuku Female Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Harajuku Female Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Harajuku Female Clothing Bundle
kDesc

Stand out on the streets of PlayStation®Home with these Harajuku inspired clothing items. This bundle includes: 
 

* nFashion - Harajuku Boots (Female) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Boots (Female) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Boots (Female) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Sandals (Female) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Sandals (Female) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Sandals (Female) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Goggles (Female) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Goggles (Female) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Goggles (Female) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Hat (Female) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Hat (Female) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Hat (Female) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Skirt (Female) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Skirt (Female) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Skirt (Female) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Pants (Female) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Pants (Female) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Pants (Female) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Hoodie (Female) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Hoodie (Female) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Hoodie (Female) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Top (Female) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Top (Female) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Top (Female) (Version 3) 
 

※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]

Faites-vous remarquer dans les rues de PlayStation®Home avec ces vêtements d'inspiration Harajuku. Ce lot comporte :

 * nFashion – Haut Harajuku (Femme) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Haut Harajuku (Femme) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Haut Harajuku (Femme) (Version 3) 
 

※ À l’achat, chaque objet sera ajouté à sa catégorie correspondante. [#Legal]
